name: Numbness
description:
You are the hero! She is scared and only you can save her!

The theme was "Two Incompatible Genres" so I decided to make a mixture of Platformer and FPS . You have to save the princess and get her out from the dungeon. Her arms get numb after drinking the potion of life. She quenched her thirst after drinking it but the outcome was horrifying. She lost the feelings of her arms. Now she asks your protection from the creepy monsters of the dungeons and puzzles to solve and get her out of the darkness.

ALERT: This game is made by a single person who is an artist,sound,music,effects,level,UI and Programmer.

Audio: By me using Bosca Ceoil and last level track from https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-town

Font: https://www.dafont.com/8bit-wonder.font

Art: Mostly by me using Piskel and some from https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-town

Sound Effects: By me
